review_title: The Worst Management I've Worked For
pros:
The customer end product
The lecturers and group leaders
It's a job
cons:
Inappropriate association between some senior staff
Awkward office atmosphere
Department bullying & mind games
Devious management
Lack of support and appreciation
Ancient processes
Outdated IT systems
No desire to change/improve
Very poor contract terms
No benefits
HR
Bad handling of COVID redundancies
Lack of UK office oversight by head office
